IRC


Connecting

If you have an IRC client you can use, you can use the following information to connect to our chat:

  • Server: chat.freenode.net:6697 (use SSL)
  • Channel: #ModernTLD

Also if youâ€™re interested, you can join #opennic on the same server to chat with the OpenNIC community as a whole.

No idea what any of that means? If you just want a simple chat just login to our webchat below:

ModernTLD

ModernTLD provides free domain registration on the OpenNIC network. Check out our site to learn more on how to connect to OpenNIC and get your very own domain for free!
